      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_80630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_80630</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Manganese oxide as a catalyst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Manganoxid als Katalysator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oxyde de manganèse comme catalyseur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Óxido do manganês como um catalizador</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ossido del manganese come catalizzatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οξείδιο μαγγάνιου ως καταλύτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Óxido del manganeso como catalizador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams demonstrate the speeding up of the splitting reaction of hydrogen peroxide by the addition of manganese oxide and its reusability as a catalyst.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">catalysts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen peroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">manganese oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen das Beschleunigen der 
aufspaltenreaktion des Wasserstoffperoxids durch die Hinzufügung des 
Manganoxids und seiner Wiederverwendungsmöglichkeit als Katalysator.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes démontrent l'accélération de la 
réaction se dédoublante du peroxyde d'hydrogène par l'ajout de 
l'oxyde de manganèse et de sa réutilisabilité comme catalyseur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas demonstram apressar-se acima da 
reação rachando do peroxide de hidrogênio pela adição do óxido 
do manganês e do seu reusability como um catalizador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi dimostrano l'accelerazione della 
reazione spaccante del perossido di idrogeno tramite l'aggiunta 
dell'ossido del manganese e della relativa riutilizzabilità come 
catalizzatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα καταδεικνύουν την επιτάχυνση της 
χωρίζοντας αντίδρασης του υπεροξειδίου υδρογόνου από την 
προσθήκη του οξειδίου μαγγάνιου και της ικανότητας 
επαναχρησιμοποίησής του ως καταλύτης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas demuestran la aceleración de la 
reacción que parte del peróxido de hidrógeno por la adición del 
óxido del manganeso y de su reutilidad como catalizador.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalysatoren</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
